name: Pixel Worlds
description: Welcome to Pixel Worlds! In this multiplatform, massively multiplayer social sandbox game you can create your own worlds and make new friends in the active community!MultiplatformPlay on PC, Mac, Android and iOS. You can play the same account on any platform!BuildCreate countless worlds. Mine resources and create new blocks and items to shape your worlds the way you want them to be.FarmAlmost anything can be grown in Pixel Worlds! Building blocks, furniture, tools, weapons and even clothes.TradeIn Pixel Worlds it is the players who run the economy. Trade blocks and items with other players, you decide the price.PlayCompete in worlds created by other players or make your own for others to enjoy. Take part in Live Events that we launch every few weeks.Join the CommunityJoin us and the other players at the official Pixel Worlds Youtube channel, weekly streams in Twitch and Mobcrush, Instagram, Forum, Twitter and Facebook.
